Package com.ontotext.russie.morph

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Lemma
    Lemma.java
    SuffixNest
    SuffixNest.java The suffit nest keeps the inflection suffixes of a lemma with their respective morpho-syntactic type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LemmaImpl
    LemmaImpl.java Implementation of the Lemma inteface that contains the wordforms of a word with their morpho-syntactic types.
    MorphologyReader
    This class reads in the morphology with the word forms and creates lists of Lemmas that present wordforms and varios other morhological and syntactic information for them.
    MorphoSyntacticType
    MorphoSyntacticType.java This class represents the morpho-syntactic type associated with a word form in the morphology.
    POSMapper  
    POSTagger  
    SuffixNestImpl
    SuffixNest.java The suffit nest keeps the inflection suffixes of a lemma with their respective morpho-syntactic type.
    SuffixPool
    SuffixPool.java A pool of suffix nests that removes the duplication of equivalent nests.
    TypePool
    TypePool.java Represents a pool of distinct morpho-syntactic types.
